subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Tennis
Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: With tennis and soccer being played simultaneously and matches not shown in Wimbledon’s public areas, fans had to be creative — or leave — to watch both.
snippet: With tennis and soccer being played simultaneously and matches not shown in Wimbledon’s public areas, fans had to be creative — or leave — to watch both.
